ThingDef.label: MK.1 combat module
ThingDef.description: A damage reactant combat brain implant. It contains an intelligent micro-computer that assists the combatant by providing immediate combat data on the current enemy, further improving every combat facets that the combatant has. The implant also possess a hidden feature where the combatant recives a sudden surge of adrenaline when afflicted with any bullet-type wound.

ThingDef.label: MK.2 combat module
ThingDef.description: A regenerative combat brain implant. The mk. 2 implant is somewhat inferior to the mk.1 in stat benefits, but the mk.2 is capable of releasing fast wound healing chemicals capable of healing severe wounds overtime.

ThingDef.label: Combat eye "Gladiator module"
ThingDef.description: An advanced combat eye implant designed specificly for melee combat. Its lens are made of high quality carbon fiber glass for maximum ballistic protection, and equipped with highly sensitive micro sensors for high quality resolution. The microsensors are also highly sensitive to muscular movement within 5 feet radius, in which it will send data to the nervous system so the combatant will react quicker than the preceding threat, further improving their efficientcy in melee combat.

ThingDef.label: Combat eye "Ranger module"
ThingDef.description: An advanced combat eye implant designed specificly for ranged combat. Its lens are highly sensitive to movement at long distance and it has 4x zoom, making the combatant highly efficient to ranged combat.

ThingDef.label: Combat arm "mantis blade"
ThingDef.description: A combat arm implant with a mantis blade hidden in the wrists, in which it can retract itself upon command and deal deadly amounts of slicing damage at frightning pace.

ThingDef.label: Combat leg "Shin buster"
ThingDef.description: A combat leg implant with a reinforced shin. The implant allows the combatant to perform a deadly roundhouse kick that can stun or inflict EMP to organic and non organic foes.

ThingDef.label: combat spine
ThingDef.description: An advanced combat spine implant crafted specificly to mimic the actual likeness of a regular spine, down to its very details. The spine is very flexible and had an uncanny feeling of having no difference towards a normal spine. The inside of the spine is filled with biogel and fiber optics, in which the biogel absorbs external shock and fiber optics improve a combatant's mobility and blood filtration. The combat spine also has a key feature of fitering toxins via blood vessels and releasing adamant chemicals that reinforces a combatant's damage resistance.

ThingDef.label: Ratel implant
ThingDef.description: A skin implant with millions of nanomachines that hardens in response to physical and environmental trauma. These nanomachines are all controlled by a central nanomachine core, which prevents these nanomachines to go rampant inside the body and control them to repair damaged tissues caused by external damage.

ThingDef.label: combat heart
ThingDef.description: An advanced combat heart implant, capable of pumping blood more efficiently and releases regenerative agents and spreading it throughout the body.

ThingDef.label: combat stomach
ThingDef.description: An advanced combat stomach implant with a built-in micronutrients storage compartment which stores extra nutrients from food, and using them when needed the most. It can also excrete chemicals that can prevent food poisoning from ever happening.

ThingDef.label: combat ear
ThingDef.description: An advanced combat ear implant that offers a patient with a more heightened sense of hearing once installed.

ThingDef.label: combat lung
ThingDef.description: An advanced combat lung implant which offers the best performance in inhaling oxygen and exhaling carbon dioxide. It can also filter external toxic fumes if inhaled.

ThingDef.label: combat kidney
ThingDef.description: An advanced combat kidney implant that is more efficient than a normal kidney.

ThingDef.label: combat liver
ThingDef.description: An advanced combat liver implant that is more efficient than a normal liver.

ThingDef.label: Executive combat module
ThingDef.description: A damage reactant combat brain implant used by the executives. It is a complete upgrade to the combat module mk.1 where the combatant receives exponential combat boost, and auto heal to permanent wounds, with the help of nanomachines flooding from the brain and spread throughout the body. The implant also has a unique feature of releasing a chemical compound called "Adrenaline EX" once been inflicted with a bullet wound.

ThingDef.label: Executive eye implant
ThingDef.description: An advanced combat eye implant used by the executives. Provides superior eye sight and offers increadible benifits to both ranged and melee combat.

ThingDef.label: Executive arm implant
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced combat arm implant used by the executives, which is far more superior that any ordinary bionic arms combined.

ThingDef.label: Executive leg implant
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced combat leg implant used by the executives, which is far more superior that any ordinary bionic legs combined.

ThingDef.label: Executive spine implant
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced combat spine implant used by the executives. It is the upgraded version of the combat spine which it possess the same benefits, but it has the latest "Reality breaker" module that upgrades all the combatant's capacity at a significant rate.

ThingDef.label: Executive skin implant
ThingDef.description: An improved version of the ratel implant, now installed wih the latest "Reality breaker" nanomachines that offers superior damage resistance and health regenerative properties.

ThingDef.label: Executive heart implant
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced combat heart implant used by the executives, now with a more efficient health regenerative capabilities.

ThingDef.label: Executive stomach implant
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced combat stomach implant used by the executives, which drastically decreases one's need in consuming food, being immune to food poisoning, and increase the efficientcy in absorbing food nutrients.

ThingDef.label: Executive ear implant
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced combat ear implant used by the executives, which offers an even more heightened sense of hearing once installed.

ThingDef.label: Executive lung implant
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced combat lung implant used bt the executives, which offers superior performance in inhaling oxygen and exhaling carbon dioxide. It can also filter external toxic fumes if inhaled.

ThingDef.label: Executive kidney implant
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced combat kidney implant used by the executives, which is superior than any normal bionic kidney.

ThingDef.label: Executive liver implant
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced combat liver implant used by the executives, which is superior than any normal bionic liver.

HediffDef.label: Psycast module
HediffDef.description: An advanced psycast module that aids a psycaster in gathering psyfocus and dissipate neural heat more efficiently, along with a bonus of having the ability to wield some psychic abilities.
HediffDef.descriptionShort: An implant which allows the user to become an even more powerful psychic user. This can be installed up to 3 times.

ThingDef.label: Grand psycast brain implant
ThingDef.description: An ultra tech brain implant designed by the archotechs. This implant is considered as one of the most tedious implant to create where it require a lot of resources just to make one implant, but the implant itself will allow the user to gain access to a plethra of powerful psychic abilities that doesn't require any psychic energy to conjure.

RecipeDef.label: install archotech grand psycast brain implant
RecipeDef.description: Install an archotech grand psycast brain implant.

ThingDef.label: Archotech buster cannon arm implant
ThingDef.description: An ultra tech combat arm implant designed by the archotechs. This arm implant provides a massive benefit to manipulation, along with the ability to inflict terrifying amounts of cutting damage using a hidden wolverine blade. It also has the ability to fire an explosive charged warhead using a retractable buster cannon.

RecipeDef.label: install archotech buster cannon arm implant
RecipeDef.description: Install an archotech buster cannon arm implant.

RecipeDef.label: remove archotech buster cannon arm implant
RecipeDef.description: Remove archotech buster cannon arm implant.
RecipeDef.jobString: Removing archotech buster cannon arm implant.

ThingDef.label: Archotech rift walker brain implant
ThingDef.description: An ultra tech brain implant designed by the archotechs. This implant is considered as one of the most powerful implant, granting the user absurd benefits in all capacities, and an ability to cast mass teleportation that can teleport the caster and their allies towards or away from danger. Though bear in mind that inorder to teleport nearby pawns, one should be under the caster's 1.9 effect radius for them to be teleported.

RecipeDef.label: install archotech rift walker brain implant
RecipeDef.description: Install an archotech rift walker brain implant.

ThingDef.label: Archotech self heal spine implant
ThingDef.description: An ultra tech spine implant designed by the archotechs. The spine implant contains potent medicinal compound that instantly finishes the body's blood clotting process and greatly boost its natural healing ability, and all of this can be manually activated by the user as a standalone ability.

RecipeDef.label: install archotech self heal spine implant
RecipeDef.description: Install an archotech self heal spine implant.

RecipeDef.label: remove archotech self heal spine implant
RecipeDef.description: Remove archotech self heal spine implant.
RecipeDef.jobString: Removing archotech self heal spine implant.

ThingDef.label: Archotech gravity propelled leg implant
ThingDef.description: An ultra tech leg implant designed by the archotechs. The leg implant not only provides an absurd benefit to movement speed, it can also propel the user to a very distant location by manipulating the gravity around it and catapulting the user through gravitational propulsion.

RecipeDef.label: install archotech gravity propelled leg implant
RecipeDef.description: Install an archotech gravity propelled leg implant.

RecipeDef.label: remove archotech gravity propelled leg implant
RecipeDef.description: Remove archotech gravity propelled leg implant.
RecipeDef.jobString: Removing archotech gravity propelled leg implant.

ThingDef.label: Archotech overdrive heart implant
ThingDef.description: An ultra tech heart implant designed by the archotechs. Considered as a must-have combat implant, the archotech overdrive heart implant can send the user in an overdriven state, where bodily function are pushed to an extreme inorder to increase melee DPS, decrease ranged cooldown and aiming delay temporarily. Although during this state, the user's hunger need will increase twofold temporarily.

RecipeDef.label: install archotech overdrive heart implant
RecipeDef.description: Install an archotech overdrive heart implant.
